name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saver: Save items and see if they're in stock

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select the size from the dropdown then click save and watch the item appear in the extension with it's price and stock status.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions allows you to simply select your size from the dropdown and click save to save the item you are currently looking at in the extension. You will then be able to see the item's price, the size you saved it in and it's stock status. 

You can then quickly look at the item in the extension without needing to load the website. You can press refresh and watch as the extension checks if the stock status has changed for your saved item in your selected size. 

You can click on the item to be taken directly to the item's to the page where you can then purchase the item.

Currently works on the following websites: https://www.theiconic.com.au/ 

More will be added.
